text: thumb|Location map of former Makioka town thumb|former Makioka Town Hall was a town located in Higashiyamanashi District, Yamanashi Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 5,797 and a density of 56.92 persons per km². The total area was 101.85 km². == History == On March 22, 2005 Makioka and Mitomi (also from Higashiyamanashi District) merged into the expanded city of Yamanashi. ==References== ==External links== * Yamanashi official website Category:Dissolved municipalities of Yamanashi Prefecture Category:Yamanashi, Yamanashi
title: Makioka, Yamanashi
